alert.note: Alert for Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 01 at 12:29PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Brevard and Orange. * WHEN...Until 215 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1228 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Some roads are still impassable. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Titusville, Christmas, Mims and Lagrange. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
